mention.text: Tuesday 's assassination of former Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi
Gandhi , 46 , a member of a family dynasty that led India for three generations
A Congress Party spokesman mother , Indira Gandhi , who was prime minister when Indira Gandhi was assassinated in 1984
the Congress Party , which was founded by A Congress Party spokesman grandfather , Jawaharlal Nehru , India 's first prime minister
Gandhi and J.B. Patnaik Congress Party
either a time bomb or remote-control device

Jawaharlal Nehru , India 's first prime minister
Paswan , a member of the Janata Dal party , which defeated Gandhi 's Congress Party in the 1989 general elections
a member of the Janata Dal party , which defeated Gandhi 's Congress Party in the 1989 general elections
the Congress Party in this election , the Hindu revivalist Bharatiya Janata Party
the Hindu revivalist Bharatiya Janata Party

a tremendous loss to democracy , senior Congress leader Vasant Sathe told reporters The loss can never be made up J.B. Patnaik , a powerful Congress politician in the eastern state of Orissa , said : J.B. Patnaik do not know what is going to happen now , how democracy will survive ; At the site of the bomb blast in Tamil Nadu , there was no immediate evidence as to who was responsible

the Bharatiya Janata Party , who denounced Gandhi for allegedly pandering to India 's Muslim minority and directing too many government resources to religious and caste minorities in an effort to win votes
J.B. Patnaik , a powerful Congress politician in the eastern state of Orissa
a powerful Congress politician in the eastern state of Orissa
a disciplined and violent guerrilla force
